item.title: Attempt with Wacom Tablet, scan & more!
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:5, topic:198274”]Fake some more will you?

DeviantArt

Runescape Dragon Chainmaille

12/21/10: HEY YOU. I made this D-chain back in the good old days of Runescape. Like this? Bring the good old days back -- vote at (runescape.com/wilderness) to bring the wildy and free trade back! ...


http://www.mailleartisans.org/members/memberdisplay.cgi?key=2409
^Dragon chain at the bottom of the page.

Also:

Staff:

DeviantArt

Runescape mystic fire staff

Graphite drawing of an orb ontop of a mystic fire staff from the game runescape. Am working on a color photomanip using the drawing, which will upload when done.

I seem to find that picture of your dad everywhere too!

DeviantArt

Runescape: Karetio

My first attempt at drawing my sister Anna ()'s character on Runescape. Anna tells me the eyes are the wrong colour but how am I supposed to know that? Anyway, it was part of her Xmas present, whic...

And the stats:
http://owlnine.deviantart.com/art/Runescape-Skills-Eloc-Nomyal-67311578

And you don’t even have a Wacom Tablet or a $50 allowance.
Please, save us the trouble and just GTFO.

P.S.: If you think just by uploading it to your Photobucket people will believe that your magically good, they wont. Well at least I wont (and I’m always right)[/quote]

Lol I do get $50 for allowance, wth you talkin about? Don’t hate cuz you not only child.

Read full topic

item.title: Attempt with Wacom Tablet, scan & more!
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

FastBawlz:

It’s basically tons of rings hooked together… And by tons I mean about 12,000…

I know I tried to make a necklace out of a few, I bent them hooked them and then bent them back The problem was getting it on/off because you had to bend it with pliers. And No one has proven the runes are fake… Yet, FASTBAWLZ!!!

Ixl Adds Ixl:

lol I wanted thi to be big april fools. fast bawls got it though lol…gj

Fuck you Ixl Adds Ixl, BAN FUCKING HAMMER![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 11:11:04 AM[/size][hr][quote=“davidude36, post:6, topic:198274”]damn, I feel an idiot for respecting Ixl Adds Ixl, its usually funny to see someone get caught stealing someone else’s work, but it just makes me feel bad for you.

Anyways bye![/quote]

item.title: Attempt with Wacom Tablet, scan & more!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Ixl Adds Ixl, post:1, topic:198274”]lol friend asked me why my dad is black, I’m adopted…duh? aw wait, this the internet lol

First i done these to impress haha, well my mom helped me put them together but I did the design:

dragchain.jpg769×879

Oh yeah, heres the necklace I did on my own

necklace.jpg1023×383

Heres my latest drawing I’ve been working on - told u hampoo! Think I was lying? lol

staff.jpg385×827

Heres the test drawing from when I first scanned it :o… lol had problems doing it

test.jpg500×639

I drawed these in art class last week

Heres my old painting I did too, this was like my 7th attempt at painting rofl

girl.jpg600×591

I drawed my dad from years later hehe

Fun with effects

man1.jpg511×735

Some stat icons I played around with last saturday

btw those stats are outdated rofl. these where from my old account called “msaiw19” - first ever acc :o… Who got banned like few months ago (like last year) for rwt.[/quote]

Too bad it’s quoted. Delete/edit the first post all you want.

And your “mom’s” arms look way too supple to be the arms of a 40 year old woman.

Read full topic

item.title: Attempt with Wacom Tablet, scan & more!
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:6, topic:198274”]damn, I feel an idiot for respecting Ixl Adds Ixl, its usually funny to see someone get caught stealing someone else’s work, but it just makes me feel bad for you.

Anyways bye![/quote]

Sad thing is that idiots like him don’t even know how to hide it.

You don’t most so many different levels of art in 1 post.
The staff is great, but the farther down you go, the shittier it gets.

Plus, the mail is so obviously a fake. Someone with the intelligence of his couldn’t possibly figure out how to put the thousands of rings together to make that. It would take a lot of practice, time, and $200. And the fact that the person modeling it was a girl sorta made me think it wasn’t him.

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:3, topic:198274”]The first one, what’s it made out of? It looks like the washers that have splits in them and you’ve hooked them together. Oh and a must have a good go at making some runes, I’ll use some molds though…

Replace your drawed’s with drew (i think)[/quote]

It’s basically tons of rings hooked together… And by tons I mean about 12,000…

I finally did it. I've got the improvements to the D-chain done. :D This is the same one as before, only... different. I've shaped the body to fit me a bit better, and added the shoulder bits with super curvy spikes. Stats are 16g 5/16" anodized aluminum for the body, The Ring Lord's small anodized scales for the shoulders, and 18g 3/16" red anodized aluminum to hold the scales together. The necklace is a glory ammy, of course, and the keris dagger (sadly) isn't my work. It weighs in at a bit under four pounds (yay aluminum), and I estimate 12,000 rings went into it.

Read full topic
